definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: The report said the pipeline agency was hampered by a chronic inspector shortage.
sentences.chinese: 报告说，长期缺乏检查员妨碍了管道安全局开展工作。

sentences.english: That inspector inspected the kennels and the puppies in it .
sentences.chinese: 检查员检查了狗窝和里面的小狗。

sentences.english: The country health agency has dedicated one inspector to monitor conditions in nursing homes.
sentences.chinese: 该国卫生机构已指定一名检查员监测各疗养院的情况。

sentences.english: To avoid more tragedies, the inspector initiated an innovation.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免更多的悲剧，检查员发动了一项革新。

sentences.english: To start with, students will not worry about being registered by disciplinary inspector when they get up late.
sentences.chinese: 首先，学生们不用担心起床晚了被纪律检查员记名。

sentences.english: The prospective inspector prospected his prospect with his own perspective.
sentences.chinese: 未来的检查员用自己的观点勘察的他的前景。

sentences.english: For that matter, how would health inspectors know?" he said.
sentences.chinese: 这么一来，卫生检查员又怎么会清楚呢？

sentences.english: The imperial censor's indiscreet conducts was countenanced by the hawk immediately.
sentences.chinese: 帝国检查员轻率行为立即得到了鹰派成员的肯定。

sentences.english: The inspector chalked O.K. on my baggage.
sentences.chinese: 检查员用粉笔在我的行李上写了“查讫”。

sentences.english: The inspector's inner feelings told him that she was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 检查员内心的感觉告诉他她是无罪的。

sentences.english: These dogs would drown if SPCA inspectors did not rescue them.
sentences.chinese: 如果SPCA检查员不解救他们，这些狗将会淹死。
检查员看见了那名妇女。
检查员也使这点悬而未定。

sentences.english: The  prospective  inspector prospected his prospect with his own  perspective.
sentences.chinese: 未来的检查员用自己的观点勘察他的前景。

sentences.english: A policeman took the inspector to an inner room.
sentences.chinese: 一名警察带检查员去了一个里面的房间。

definition: attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
service (on a train, a plane etc)
